    • Uses of IGossip in org.corfudb.client.gossip

      Classes in org.corfudb.client.gossip that implement IGossip 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StreamCreatedGossip
      This gossip message is sent whenever a new stream is created.
      class  StreamDiscoveryRequestGossip
      This gossip message is sent whenever a stream needs to be discovered.
      class  StreamDiscoveryResponseGossip
      This gossip message is sent in response to a discovery request.
      class  StreamEpochGossipEntry
      This gossip message is sent whenever the epoch changes for a stream.
